imdb.plot outline: Four friendly creatures, a spaceship, and the whole wide universe to explore. Together Des, Guagua, Lili and Ponk will discover uncharted planets, meet new friends, and overcome difficulties. Get ready to learn and have fun with Flipos, in an adventure from out of this world. Flipos teaches basic concepts for preschoolers such as Day-Night, Up-Down, or Big-Small.
imdb.title: Flipos
plot: Four friendly creatures, a spaceship, and the whole wide universe to explore. Together Des, Guagua, Lili and Ponk will discover uncharted planets, meet new friends, and overcome difficulties. Get ready to learn and have fun with _Flipos_ (qv), in an adventure from out of this world. _Flipos_ (qv) teaches basic concepts for preschoolers such as Day-Night, Up-Down, or Big-Small.::Vargas, Gabriel Osorio
